S06bsu050_u:4: ekasmin samaye bhagavān rājagṛhe viharati sma gṛdhrakūṭe parvate mahatā bhikṣusaṃghena sārdhaṃ dvādaśasāhasrapañcaśatairbodhisattvakoṭiniyutaśatasahasraiḥ sārdhaṃ viharati sma,
S06bsu050_u:5: lokapālādidevakoṭiniyutasahasraiḥ parivṛtaḥ puraskṛtaḥ śrīsiṃhāsane viharati sma //
S06bsu050_u:6_0: atha khalu bodhisattvo mahāsattvo āryāvalokiteśvaro utthāya āsanādekamaṃsamuttarāsaṅgaṃ
S06bsu050_u:6_1: kṛtvā dakṣiṇaṃ jānumaṇḍalaṃ pṛthivyāṃ pratiṣṭhāpya yena bhagavāṃstenāñjaliṃ praṇamya
S06bsu050_u:6_2: prahasitavadano bhūtvā bhagavantametadavocat - deśayatu bhagavān prajñāpāramitāṃ
S06bsu050_u:9: ye ca sattvā mantrasādhane udyuktāsteṣāṃ cāvighnena mantrāḥ sidhyanti //
S06bsu050_u:10: atha khalu bhagavān āryāvalokiteśvarāya bodhisattvāya mahāsattvāya mahākaruṇikāya sādhukāramadāt - sādhu sādhu kulaputra,
S06bsu050_u:11: yastvaṃ sarvasattvānāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya pradhānāya ca dīrgharātraṃ niyuktaḥ /
S06bsu050_u:13: sādhu ca suṣṭhu ca manasi kuru /
S06bsu050_u:17: ye ca sattvā mantrasādhane udyuktāsteṣāṃ cāvighnenaḥ mantrāḥ sidhyanti //
S06bsu050_u:18: atha khalu āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - tena hi sugata bhāṣatu sarvasattvānāmarthāya hitāya sukhāya ca //
S06bsu050_u:19: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ sarvaduḥkhapramocano nāma samādhiṃ samāpadyate sma,
S06bsu050_u:20: yasya ca samādhiṃ samāpannasya bhagavata ūrṇākośavivarāllavādanekāni raśmikoṭiniyutaśatasahasrāṇi niścaranti sma /
S06bsu050_u:24: yāvannārakāḥ sattvāḥ * * *sarve ca buddhakṣetrāṇi ṣaḍvikāraṃ praviceluḥ /
S06bsu050_u:26: atha khalu bhagavāṃstasyāṃ velāyāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ bhāṣate sma /
S06bsu050_u:34: tadyathā - oṃ mune mune mahāmunaye svāhā //
S06bsu050_u:35: asyāḥ prajñāpāramitāyā lābhāt mayā anuttarā samyaksaṃbodhiranuprāptā /
S06bsu050_u:39: tena hi tvaṃ sarvabodhisattvānāmagrato buddhatve ca vyākṛtaḥ - bhaviṣyasi tvaṃ māṇava anāgate 'dhvani sa(mantaraśmisamu)
S06bsu050_u:40: dgataḥ śrīkūṭarājā nāma tathāgato 'rhan samyaksaṃbuddho vidyācaraṇasaṃpannaḥ sugato lokavid anuttaraḥ puruṣadamyasārathiḥ śāstā devānāṃ ca manuṣyāṇāṃ ca buddho bhagavān /
S06bsu050_u:42: ] ye idaṃ nāmadheyaṃ śroṣyanti dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti likhayayiṣyanti,
S06bsu050_u:45: te sarve alpopāyena alpaśravaṇena ca tathāgatā bhaviṣyanti /
S06bsu050_u:46: tadyathā - oṃ jeya jeya padmābhe avame avame sarasaraṇi dhiridhiri devatā anupālani yuddhottāriṇi paracakranivāriṇi pūraya pūraya bhagavati sarva āśā mama ca sarvasattvānāṃ ca /
S06bsu050_u:49: iyaṃ sā kulaputra paramārthaprajñāpāramitā sarvabuddhānāṃ jananī bodhisattvamātā (bodhidātrī)
S06bsu050_u:51: sarvabuddhairapi na śaknoti asyānuśaṃsā vaktuṃ yāvatkalpakoṭiśatairapi /
S06bsu050_u:54: atha āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - kena kāraṇena bhagavan iyaṃ svalpākṣarā prajñāpāramitā?
S06bsu050_u:57: te 'pi imāṃ prajñāpāramitāṃ svalpākṣarāṃ dhārayiṣyanti vācayiṣyanti likhiṣyanti likhayiṣyanti,
S06bsu050_u:59: anena kāraṇena kulaputra iyaṃ saṃkṣiptā svalpākṣarā prajñāpāramitā //
S06bsu050_u:60: evamukte āryāvalokiteśvaro bodhisattvo mahāsattvo bhagavantametadavocat - āścaryaṃ bhagavan,
S06bsu050_u:62: yāvadeva bhagavān sarvasattvahitāya ayaṃ dharmaparyāyo bhāṣito mandapudgalānāmeva arthāya hitāya sukhāya ceti //
S06bsu050_u:65: te ca bhikṣavaste ca bodhisattvāḥ sā ca sarvāvatī parṣat sadevamānuṣāsuragandharvaśca loko bhagavato bhāṣitamabhyanandanniti //
